flashcompensation: -3 to +1 EV in increments of 1/3 EV
flashcontrol: TTL: i-TTL flash control using 420-pixel RGB sensor is available with built-in flash and SB-910, SB-900, SB-800, SB-700, SB-600, or SB-400; i-TTL balanced fill-flash for digital SLR is used with matrix and center-weighted
focusingscreen: Type B BriteView Clear Matte Mark VII screen
flashsyncmodes: Front-curtain sync (normal)Rear-curtain syncRed-Eye reductionRed-Eye reduction with slow syncSlow sync
flashreadyindicator: Lights when built-in flash or optional flash unit such as SB-910, SB-900, SB-400, SB-80DX, SB-28DX or SB-50DX is fully charged
